pinyin: jing4 zuo4 kang4 yi4 shi4 wei1

sentences.english: They returned to the store with other protesters day after day.
sentences.chinese: 他們與其他抗議者日復一日的來到這個餐館。

sentences.english: Will the Chinese Government allow this kind of protest during the May Day?
sentences.chinese: 中國政府是否允許“五一”期間發生這類抗議活動？

sentences.english: I met Akmal in Warsaw about two-and-a-half years ago on a protest organised by Polish nurses.
sentences.chinese: 兩年半前，我和阿克毛在一個抗議活動中相識。

sentences.english: Protesters also clashed with security in the troubled city of Port Said.
sentences.chinese: 抗議人士還在塞得港和警方發生衝突。

sentences.english: In Egypt, there have been reports of street protests over the cost of tomatoes.
sentences.chinese: 在埃及也有報導過，因爲番茄價格而有人上街抗議。

sentences.english: This protest will not affect the summit and its outcome.
sentences.chinese: 此次抗議活動將不會左右峯會本身及其結果。

sentences.english: An anti-nuclear demonstrator protest in Parliament Square in London March 14, 2007.
sentences.chinese: 英國倫敦國會廣場前抗議的反核示威者。

sentences.english: On Wednesday, the tobacconists went to on strike against the a new anti-smoking law.
sentences.chinese: 星期三，菸草製造商繼續抗議政府的新反吸菸法。

sentences.english: Protesters also seized the country's state-owned television station.
sentences.chinese: 抗議羣衆還佔據了吉爾吉斯斯坦國營電視臺。

sentences.english: Cavic was not interested the protest.
sentences.chinese: 卡維奇對抗議不感興趣。

sentences.english: All of us hunger-struck last time.
sentences.chinese: 上次我們全都參加了絕食抗議運動。

sentences.english: They ranted and raved at the injustice of it all.
sentences.chinese: 他們不停的咆哮以抗議這事的不公。

sentences.english: At least one-thousand protesters rallied for the final day of the convention.
sentences.chinese: 在大會的最後一天，至少有一千名抗議者舉行集會。

sentences.english: Tanks rumbled down the streets of Deraa, trying to seize the city back from protesters.
sentences.chinese: 坦克駛進德拉的街頭，試圖抓獲回城的抗議者。

sentences.english: Protesters in August forced the closing of a chemical plant in Dalian.
sentences.chinese: 八月，抗議者們迫使大連一家化工廠關閉。

sentences.english: There were further protests in the coastal city of Hodeida.
sentences.chinese: 沿海城市荷臺達也爆發了進一步的抗議活動。

definition: to fight against/to oppose/to be opposed to/opposition
to resist/to make a stand and fight (against)
to criticize/to find fault with/to denounce
to call into question/to question (truth or validity)
